meanings.sent1: I love to eat blins with jam for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: In Russia, blins are often served with sour cream.
meanings.sent3: When the blins are ready, they dance in the pan!
meanings.sent4: The blins stacked high looked like a tower of deliciousness.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly cooked blins filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation of surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Blins! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh blins, I can't believe I missed the bus!
meanings.sent3: Blins, that was a close call with the door slamming shut.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the moment, she shouted 'blins!' in frustration.
meanings.sent5: Blins! The sudden rain ruined our picnic plans.
